```r
set.seed(135)
k.candidates <- c(3,5,7,9,11)
results <- data.frame()
for(kc in k.candidates) {
  knn.pred <- knn(train = training.set,
                  test = validate.set,
                  cl = train.labels,
                  k = kc)
  
  conf.mat <- as.matrix( table(knn.pred, validate.labels) )
  eval.res <- compute.eval.measures(conf.mat)
  results <- rbind(results, eval.res)
}
colnames(results) <- c(\accuracy\"
